actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To expand the Federal tax refund intercept program to cover children who are not minors.
short_title: Child Support Fairness and Tax Refund Interception Act of 2003

summary.text: Child Support Fairness and Tax Refund Interception Act of 2003 - Amends title IV part D (Child Support and Establishment of Paternity) of the Social Security Act to provide for the use of the tax refund intercept program to collect past-due child support on behalf of children who are not minors.

titles.title: Child Support Fairness and Tax Refund Interception Act of 2003
To expand the Federal tax refund intercept program to cover children who are not minors.
